Text: You can edit your torrents afterwards. Will we get a fix?

Hmm... I'm just investigating the issues with the comment system. The last time I tried to paste the review over from my word processor and this fucked up all apostrophes (' and ") and Umlauts (Ă¸). It also wouldn't let me post URLs... Do you have a hint for me how I can fix this?

Oh, and one more thing:
Do you have the power to delete comments in your torrents?
